title: Posting to Peepeth dApp returns "Unprocessable Entity"
body:
[comment]: # (Please replace ... with your information. Remove < and >)

### Description

*Type*: Bug

*Summary*: I manage to authenticate/log in to Peepeth, but when I try posting to IPFS, I get an error: "Unprocessable Entity".

#### Expected behavior
In other dApp browsers when I press Post, the post is sent to IPFS and the compose window is closed automatically.

#### Actual behavior
When Post is pressed, the peep doesn't get saved, user remains in the editor window.

### Reproduction

- Open Status
- Press +
- Tap Open dApp
- Locate and tap on Peepeth in Social Networks
- _Open
- If you never used it on your device, press Enter in the top right-hand corner
- Press blue Pen icon (compose a new peep)
(- Press Sign in to peep for free, if you have free peeping enabled for your account)
(- Sign the transaction)
(- Once back in Peepeth go again to the Compose window)
- Write a message and press Post
- Error appears and you're still in the compose window

### Solution
[comment]: # (Please summarise the solution and provide a task list on what needs to be fixed.)
*Summary*: I'm not familiar what the solution should be, but the error is not present in neither Toshi nor Trust browsers, nor on the desktop via MetaMask.

### Additional Information
* Status version: Error present on two latest nightlies 0.9.25 (6293 and 6299) and PS version 0.9.24 (6291)
* Operating System: Tested on one Android 6.0.1 (rooted) and 2 different 7.0 devices (rooted and non-rooted), all producing the same error.

#### Logs


Attached are the logs from the rooted Android 7 device and the error message.

[2018-08-03-16-51-45.txt](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/files/2257569/2018-08-03-16-51-45.txt)
